column4: i tried unetbootin for installing xubuntu to my netbook, but didnt have much success. first: installation didnt recognize my network (only wifi). secondly it failed and couldnt install after it had made partitions..
i tried using 12 alternate install iso for it
unetbootin doesnt seem to have options for 12LTS, is this issue?
i always check the iso with md5 and use dd to write to the usb , dding is simple
